document.full_text: an illinois man who allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door of a plane in mid-flight was charged by federal prosecutors on monday with interfering with a flight crew and crimes involving aircraft, authorities said on monday.
document.title: man charged for allegedly trying to open plane door
lines_and_colors: an illinois man who allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door of a plane in mid-flight was charged by federal prosecutors on monday with interfering with a flight crew and crimes involving aircraft, authorities said on monday.
